content.description: Climb the featured face right of the Crack, finishing up left via the dirty foot ledge.
From Sheridan: "Climb the well-featured crack to a nice top-out ledge"
content.protection: Can be top roped. On the tall side but pretty secure. Landing is good. A pad or so.

content.description: This is my personal favorite line at underwear rock! I have noticed no one has made a topo for this route and considering I climb this line almost every morning as a warmup I thought I would share. It is the tallest route to the right of briefs. I spent the time earlier this season to clean and make the line more noticeable. Since there has been no previous name for the line in my knowledge, butthole is fitting because of the large awesome hole Used as a crucial feature. The crux move making is the small right crimp before the pocket or the first move off the ground.
content.location: obvious bolder off the side of the road when arriving at the sword/underwear rock location.

content.description: Start left of the crack on a small crimp for your right, and not much for your left. Find your feet on smears or edges, and make your way up along some crimp rails
content.location: Underwear Rock, left of the obvious crack.

content.description:
Cool moves up chunky holds on the left side of the wall. After getting the crimps behind the bulge I think moving right to the ledge and topping out as for

Briefs

is fun. More climbing than it looks like.

Starting this problem and traversing into

Dingleberry Junction V0

(uphill side of right arete) is a fun warmup and not much harder than V0/1.
content.location:
To the left of

Briefs

on Underwear Rock. First bp you come to.

content.description: This fun line starts on Boxers and finishes on Briefs. This makes for a much more interesting climb than the Boxers line, but is still pretty accessible for newer boulderers who might find the tiny crimps on the start of Briefs a little too hard to pull on.
content.protection: 1 pad is plenty; very clean landing area
content.location: Left-side of the Underwear boulder. Start on the obvious crimp jug and make your way right on some progressively worse crimps and a cool "bread loaf" pinch.
